body_html: Hey @hobarrera, thanks for this — we're looking into it now. Just to make sure — you're not able to sign in at all, which means you can't access your profile, right? It seems like there's a bit of an issue in the user confirming workflow. As a quick fix I should be able to fill out the missing information in your profile to confirm it and we will look into the bug later...
